official_title: Positive Youth Development in the Metaverse - Development of a Virtual Reality Afterschool Program for Middle Childhood Youth
inclusion_criteria:
* Children enrolled in the Chess & Community program
* Between the ages of 9-17
* The parent/primary caregiver of these children
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 9 Years
exclusion_criteria: * Children who are unable to wear a VR headset will not be recruited
